actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to suspend the mandatory withholding of State income taxes from pay of certian Federal employees whose regular place of employment is within an area affected by a boundary dispute.

summary.text: Prohibits the mandatory withholding of State income taxes from the pay of certain Federal employees whose regular place of employment is at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard, Portsmouth, New Hampshire, except upon an employee's request, until the boundary dispute between New Hampshire and Maine is settled.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the mandatory withholding of State income taxes from pay of certian Federal employees whose regular place of employment is within an area affected by a boundary dispute.
